title: Supersingular Brauer Classes in positive characteristic
abstract:
In this article, we define supersingular Brauer classes in positive
characteristic and study their role in the Brauer-Manin obstruction. We relate
this notion to the Brauer group of supersingular K3 surfaces and use our
results to study the Brauer-Manin set cut out by the $p$-torsion Brauer group.
